publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-82 Mr John Home Robertson: Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Robin Rigg Offshore Wind Farm (Navigation and Fishing) (Scotland) Bill be passed.
